channel.title: About our channel
channel.description:
zstars,
lawl showed me how to add to the "autoinvite" list, you just
/mode <channel> +I <nick>
i've already added a couple nicknames to the list, and it lets you join the channel without an invite.
the following nicknames are on the list (so you can't join if that's not your nickname):
- zstars - triton - thiefmn6092 - haticks - TeleNubby - Kamu - lawl - c|p - seand
i figured nicknames would be the best way to do it, because people change hosts and vhosts and that would make a hassle for adding new ones and stuff, so i also set the channel to +R, which lawl said would only allow registered nicks to join.. so we don't have impostors stealing names and joining our secret channel! >:D

item.title: About our channel
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:4, topic:171001”][quote author=Graham link=topic=231009.msg2186503#msg2186503 date=1208208993]
Can anyone give me info on this? is it still in use? - you didn’t add me
[/quote]Way to bump a two-month old topic.

But yeah, I dont think we use the development channel anymore. And if he was speaking about #RuneEmu, then that autoinvite list he set is long gone.[/quote]

Lol - not really bumping because there are only two topics on this board.

Read full topic

item.title: About our channel
item.dc:creator: @zstars zstars
item.description:
@zstars wrote:

That channel is not really in use anymore, easier to just use #runeemu

Read full topic

zstars,

lawl showed me how to add to the “autoinvite” list, you just

/mode +I

i’ve already added a couple nicknames to the list, and it lets you join the channel without an invite.

the following nicknames are on the list (so you can’t join if that’s not your nickname):

i figured nicknames would be the best way to do it, because people change hosts and vhosts and that would make a hassle for adding new ones and stuff, so i also set the channel to +R, which lawl said would only allow registered nicks to join… so we don’t have impostors stealing names and joining our secret channel! >:D
